page.title: 11RURAL ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: HOLDENBY WHICH IS A VERY SMALL HAMLET HAS A LARGE COUNTRY MANSION HOLDENBY HOUSE, WHICH IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC THERE IS A YOUNG MAN WORKING IN THE STABLES MAKING POTTERY, WHICH HE SELLS TO THE VISITORS TO THE HOUSE. SPRATTON WHICH IS A MUCH LARGER VILLAGE HAS A FLOURISHING WOMENS INSTITUTE WITH THE MEMBERS PARTICIPATING IN COOKERY AND A VARIETY OF CRAFTS NAMELY DRESSMAKING, LACE MAKING,EMBROIDERY,FLOWER ARRANGING, CROCHET AND SOFT TOY MAKING. ONE PARTICULAR KIND OF LACE WHICH IS CURRENTLY VERY POPULAR IS PILLOW LACE - THIS IS MADE LOCALLY BY ONE ENTHUSIASTIC LADY FOR HER OWN ENJOYMENT. MOST OF THESE LADIES EXHIBIT AT LOCAL SHOWS,PETERBOROUGH AND THE BRAMPTONS BIENNIAL FLOWER AND PRODUCE SHOW.
